newsitem.title: PERU: Supermodel Claudia Schiffer dreams of being cloned.
newsitem.headline: Supermodel Claudia Schiffer dreams of being cloned.

text.p: German supermodel Claudia Schiffer shared a dream on Friday that might delight many of her male admirers: she would love to be cloned.
"I'd love to have two (clones) so that I could have more time for myself," Schiffer told a news conference in Lima.
Schiffer is in Peru to promote a local credit card and take part in a fashion show.

The famous blonde, who visited Colombia last year, said she and fellow supermodels Christy Turlington, Elle MacPherson and Naomi Campbell hoped to open a branch of their Fashion Cafe chain in Latin America shortly.
"We are studying the main Latin American cities and it is very likely that by the end of July we will have opened one in Mexico," she said.
